languages.text: "Короче, ты превратил{mf|ся|ась} из Вольного Торговца в кусок кракенова говна. Очень интересно, но заткнись". {n}Ульфар переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Только что я понял, как мало ценил твою духовную стойкость, эттфатер".

"In short, you've gone from being a Rogue Trader to being a piece of kraken shit. This is very interesting, but shut up." {n}Ulfar shifts his gaze to you.{/n} "I have just realised I have not given your spiritual fortitude the credit it deserves, Aett-Vater."
languages.original_text: "Короче, ты превратил{mf|ся|ась} из Вольного Торговца в кусок кракенова говна. Очень интересно, но заткнись". {n}Ульфар переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Только что я понял, как мало ценил твою духовную стойкость, эттфатер".

traits.locale_text: "In short, you've gone from being a Rogue Trader to being a piece of kraken shit. This is very interesting, but shut up." {n}Ulfar shifts his gaze to you.{/n} "I have just realised I have not given your spiritual fortitude the credit it deserves, Aett-Vater."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In short, you've gone from being a Rogue Trader to being a piece of kraken shit. This is very interesting, but shut up." {n}Ulfar shifts his gaze to you.{/n} "I have just realised I have not given your spiritual fortitude the credit it deserves, Aett-Vater."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In short, you've gone from being a Rogue Trader to being a piece of kraken shit. This is very interesting, but shut up." {n}Ulfar shifts his gaze to you.{/n} "I have just realised I have not given your spiritual fortitude the credit it deserves, Aett-Vater."

traits.locale_text: "In short, you've gone from being a Rogue Trader to being a piece of kraken shit. This is very interesting, but shut up." {n}Ulfar shifts his gaze to you.{/n} "I have just realised I have not given your spiritual fortitude the credit it deserves, Aett-Vater."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「つまり、お前は自由開拓者からクラーケンの糞になったわけか。こいつは実に愉快だが、黙ってろ」{n}ウルファーは視線をあなたに移す。{/n}「お前の精神の不屈さについてだが、信用に値するとは言いきれないと気づいたとこだ、アエット＝ヴァテル」
languages.original_text: "In short, you've gone from being a Rogue Trader to being a piece of kraken shit. This is very interesting, but shut up." {n}Ulfar shifts his gaze to you.{/n} "I have just realised I have not given your spiritual fortitude the credit it deserves, Aett-Vater."

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、お前は自由開拓者からクラーケンの糞になったわけか。こいつは実に愉快だが、黙ってろ」{n}ウルファーは視線をあなたに移す。{/n}「お前の精神の不屈さについてだが、信用に値するとは言いきれないと気づいたとこだ、アエット＝ヴァテル」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “长话短说，就是你不干行商浪人了，改行去当海怪拉出来的臭屎。这可真有意思，但你给我闭嘴。”{n}乌尔法转头盯着你。{/n}“我才意识到，我以前真该多夸夸你坚毅的精神，狼领。”
languages.original_text: "In short, you've gone from being a Rogue Trader to being a piece of kraken shit. This is very interesting, but shut up." {n}Ulfar shifts his gaze to you.{/n} "I have just realised I have not given your spiritual fortitude the credit it deserves, Aett-Vater."

traits.locale_text: “长话短说，就是你不干行商浪人了，改行去当海怪拉出来的臭屎。这可真有意思，但你给我闭嘴。”{n}乌尔法转头盯着你。{/n}“我才意识到，我以前真该多夸夸你坚毅的精神，狼领。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Pour résumer, vous êtes {mf|passé|passée} de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} à sac à merde de kraken. C'est très intéressant, mais taisez-vous. » {n}Ulfar tourne son regard vers vous.{/n} « Je me rends compte que je n'ai pas salué votre force d'âme comme elle le mérite, aett-vater. »
languages.original_text: "In short, you've gone from being a Rogue Trader to being a piece of kraken shit. This is very interesting, but shut up." {n}Ulfar shifts his gaze to you.{/n} "I have just realised I have not given your spiritual fortitude the credit it deserves, Aett-Vater."

traits.locale_text: « Pour résumer, vous êtes {mf|passé|passée} de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} à sac à merde de kraken. C'est très intéressant, mais taisez-vous. » {n}Ulfar tourne son regard vers vous.{/n} « Je me rends compte que je n'ai pas salué votre force d’âme comme elle le mérite, aett-vater. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «En resumidas cuentas, ha pasado de ser {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente a una boñiga de kraken. Será todo lo interesante que quiera, pero cállese». {n}Ulfar dirige su mirada hacia ti.{/n} «Acabo de reparar en que no le he dado a su entereza espiritual el mérito que se merece, Aett-Vater».
languages.original_text: "In short, you've gone from being a Rogue Trader to being a piece of kraken shit. This is very interesting, but shut up." {n}Ulfar shifts his gaze to you.{/n} "I have just realised I have not given your spiritual fortitude the credit it deserves, Aett-Vater."

traits.locale_text: «En resumidas cuentas, ha pasado de ser {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente a una boñiga de kraken. Será todo lo interesante que quiera, pero cállese». {n}Ulfar dirige su mirada hacia ti.{/n} «Acabo de reparar en que no le he dado a su entereza espiritual el mérito que se merece, Aett-Vater».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Einfach gesagt habt Ihr Euch von einem Freihändler in ein Stück Krakenscheiße verwandelt. Das ist sehr interessant, aber haltet den Mund." {n}Ulfar wenden seinen Blick dir zu.{/n} "Ich habe eben erkannt, dass ich Eurer spirituellen Tapferkeit nicht den Respekt erwiesen habe, den sie verdient, Aett-Vater."
languages.original_text: "In short, you've gone from being a Rogue Trader to being a piece of kraken shit. This is very interesting, but shut up." {n}Ulfar shifts his gaze to you.{/n} "I have just realised I have not given your spiritual fortitude the credit it deserves, Aett-Vater."

traits.locale_text: "Einfach gesagt habt Ihr Euch von einem Freihändler in ein Stück Krakenscheiße verwandelt. Das ist sehr interessant, aber haltet den Mund." {n}Ulfar wenden seinen Blick dir zu.{/n} "Ich habe eben erkannt, dass ich Eurer spirituellen Tapferkeit nicht den Respekt erwiesen habe, den sie verdient, Aett-Vater."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Kısacası Hür Tacir iken aşağılık bir kraken olup çıktın. Çok ilginç. Şimdi kapa çeneni." {n}Ulfar, bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Manevi kudretine hak ettiği değeri vermediğimi fark ettim Aett-Vater."
languages.original_text: "In short, you've gone from being a Rogue Trader to being a piece of kraken shit. This is very interesting, but shut up." {n}Ulfar shifts his gaze to you.{/n} "I have just realised I have not given your spiritual fortitude the credit it deserves, Aett-Vater."
